mapper.sql: <choose> <when test=" kind== ' kindSubject '> where title like '%'||#{search}||'%' </when> <when test=" kind == ' kindContents '> where contents like '%'||#{search}||'%' </when> <otherwise> where writer like '%'||#{search}||'%' </otherwise> </choose>
mapper.update: update qna set step = step + 1 where ref = (selet ref from qna where num = #{num}) and step > (select stpe from qna where num = #{num})
mapper.insert: insert into qna values(board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0,(select ref from qna where num =#{num}),(select step from qna where num = #{num})+1,(select depth from qna where num =#{num})+1)
mapper.select:
select * from (select N.*, rownum R from (select * from qna
order by ref desc,step asc) N) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
